radiographic_examinations.findings: Numerous diverticula of the sigmoid colon with bowel wall thickening of the mid sigmoid colon. A left pelvic fluid collection that had previously measured 3 cm has almost resolved. A tiny residual fluid focus measuring 1.1 cm is seen at the location of the prior fluid collection. Trace fluid in the pelvis is unchanged.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The left pelvic fluid collection has almost resolved since the prior exam.
